name: Companion Transportation
components: V, S, F (a feather, tuft of fur, or similar momento from your target)
target: yourself and one animal companion, familiar, or spirit animal within range
text: You trade places with the other target, teleporting as if you were both affected by dimension door. Both you and the other target arrive in a square you choose in the other’s former space. If the targets are different sizes, they must appear in locations that cover previously occupied squares. As with dimension door, after casting this spell, you can’t take any other actions until your next turn, and the other target is staggered until the end of its next turn due to the transposition.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，器材（一根羽毛，一簇皮毛，或来自你目标的相似纪念品）
target_zh: 你自己和一只距离内的动物伙伴，魔宠，或魂兽
text_zh: 你与其他目标交换位置，这种传送就像你们双方都受到任意门的影响一样。你和其他目标都会到达你选择的其他人先前所处的方格。如果目标是不同的体型，他们必须出现在覆盖以前被占领的方格的位置。与任意门一样，在施放了这个法术之后，你不能再采取任何其他行动，直到你的下一个回合，而另一个目标会因为转移而恍惚，直到他的下一个回合结束。
